mapper.select: select fullName from tbl_attach where fno = #{fno} order by regdate
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_attach (fullName, fno) values (#{fullName}, last_insert_id())
mapper.update: update tbl_truck set reviewcnt = reviewcnt + #{amount} where fno=#{fno}
mapper.select:
select fno, title, writer, open_check, lat, lng, regdate, updatedate, reviewcnt, likecnt from tbl_truck
order by fno desc limit #{skip}, 10
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_truck (title, content, writer, open_check, lat, lng) values (#{title},#{content},#{writer}, #{open_check}, #{lat}, #{lng});
mapper.update: update tbl_truck set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, open_check=#{open_check}, lat=#{lat}, lng=#{lng}, updatedate=now() where fno=#{fno};
